channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MI

item.title: Report X-2023080489
item.description:
Report X-2023080489

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-27
  • City: GRAND RAPIDS
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WET BOX FOUND DURING UNLOAD AND RIPPED WHEN PUTTING IN A HAZMAT TOTE, THEN BROUGHT OVER FOR INSPECTION. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS FOUND TO BE A DAMAGED HAZMAT AND THE HAZMAT PROCESS WAS STARTED. DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION IT WAS FOUND TO HAVE A CRACK OR PUNCTURE HOLE IN THE BOTTOM CORNER OF THE BLADDER / CONTAINER. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: CRACK OR PUNCTURE HOLE OF THE BLADDER / CONTAINER WAS TURNED UP.

item.title: Report X-2023080290
item.description:
Report X-2023080290

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-22
  • City: SALINE
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was discovered to be wet when unloading from a trailer and brought to QA. DescribePack: Two of the bottles are a hazardous material, which is leaking through the loose caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was placed in a plastic bin to contain the leak.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: WET BOX WAS FOUND DURING THE LOADING PROCESS AND BROUGHT OVER FOR INSPECTION. IT WAS FOUND TO BE A DAMAGED HAZMAT AND THE HAZMAT PROCESS WAS STARTED. DescribePack: PRODUCT WAS FOUND TO BE LEAKING OUT OF ITS CAP DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: BOX WAS TURNED CAP UP.

item.title: Report X-2023080186
item.description:
Report X-2023080186

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-21T15:11:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-20
  • City: LANSING
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was found to be a little wet after being loaded on the truck and was removed and brought to QA, DescribePack: The caps were loose and liquid spilled out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The package was put in a plastic bag lined hazmat bin and brought to QA. The caps to the bottles were then screwed back on correctly.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS OFFLOADED FROM TRAILER AND PUT ON ROLLERS, LEAK WAS DISCOVERED, INHOUSE CLEAN UP FROM QA WITH GLOVES, HAZMAT BIN AND ABSORBANT PADS DescribePack: THE SEAL ON THE LID WAS DEFECTED AND LEAKING DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: HAZMAT BIN AND ABSORBANT PADS
